item.title: Buttons
item.description: Main Menu Button Function A Choose B Cancel Control Pad Move cursor In Game Button Function B Back to Main Menu R Skip to next barrage (You cannot skip in Shooting Mode) Start, Select Toggle slow mode Control Pad Move Show Mode You can toggle slow mode by START or SELECT. Bullets will be slowed down to 1/4 speed. The color of the bullets becomes purple. You need “Jewel” to enter slow mode.

item.title: Development
item.description: How to build Requirements devkitPro r18 (buildscripts 20060412) You need to use version r18. Do not use the latest release! Steps Execute the following commands in Terminal. git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/pqrs-org/BulletGBA.git cd BulletGBA/bulletgba/ make How to replace graphic resources Steps Download tools.tar.gz Execute following commands to setup gba-tools. mkdir ~/gba cd ~/gba tar zxf tools.tar.gz cd tools/bmp2c make clean all Modify graphic resources under bulletgba/images. Execute following commands to convert graphic resources.
